name: HJ Solar
description:
Hengji PV-Tech Energy Co. Ltd ( Brand name: HJ Solar) is a professional PV  modules manufacturer base in China.We made our solar wafer, solar cell and solar panel to ensure the quality of panel is steady. 

Our main markets are in European Countries such as Germany, Belgium  UK,Holland, Denmark. Our market strategy is trying to have good quality as our first priority ,  then at the same time, to keep the price more competitive than those Tier one brand. we have good reputation on quality from our existing customers ( a lot of them are from UK).

We have our central EU warehouse in Rotterdam which keep a average number of 3-5MW stock for retail market, all the  goods has been custom cleared and ready for pick up immediately. For more about us, you can visit our website at www.hjsolarpv.com
